title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\Featurestore\OnlineServingConfig\Scaling
name: Scaling
description:
Online serving scaling configuration. If min_node_count and max_node_count are set to the same value, the cluster will be configured with the fixed number of node (no auto-scaling).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.Featurestore.OnlineServingConfig.Scaling

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.min_node_count
params.description: Required. The minimum number of nodes to scale down to. Must be greater than or equal to 1.

params.name: data.max_node_count
params.description: The maximum number of nodes to scale up to. Must be greater than min_node_count, and less than or equal to 10 times of 'min_node_count'.

methods.name: getMinNodeCount
methods.description:
Required. The minimum number of nodes to scale down to. Must be greater than or equal to 1.

Generated from protobuf field int32 min_node_count = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
